text: Mufti Mohammad Sayeed (12 January 1936 - 7 January 2016) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the People's Democratic Party (PDP). He served as the Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir from 2 November 2002 until 2 November 2005 and, again, from 1 March 2015 until his death. Sayeed was born in Bijbehara, Kashmir and Jammu. He was a Kashmiri Muslim. He was married and had three children. Sayeed died from multiple organ failure on 7 January 2016 in New Delhi, aged 79. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Jammu and Kashmir Category:Indian Muslims
title: Mufti Mohammad Sayeed
